Question
========

When splitting variance in an orthogonal factorial ANOVA analysis, then... 
Answerlist
----------
* ...the main effects of factors A and B are not correlated with the interaction effect AxB.
* ...are factors A and B correlated but not correlated with the interaction effect AxB
* ...factors A and B are not correlated with each other, but possibly with the interaction effect AxB
* ...all variance in the model is explained by only the main effects of factors A and B.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Correct
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
